first: ^!!! you have package in here!! go downstairs
second: ^but the only problem is I don't know how to assemble these
^ow, Ian can help me about these things...
third: ^Hi Ian!, there are some mysterious packages that came to our home
^Well I don't know, but can you help me build a computer from these parts?
^I have a desk in my room at my house, we can use it as our building desk
fourth: ^I invited Ian, to help me build these parts Mom
^Ok sure, are ya'll already have dinner?
^Come with me, we should go upstairs to build this PC
fifth: ^I want you to Open Your Building Desk
sixth: ^Now I want you to put your <color=orange>Case</color>  in the Table First
^(Click the <color=orange>Case Button</color> and Select the Case)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the Case)
sixthDoneCase: ^(Click the <color=green>Motherboard Button</color> and Select the Motherboard)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the Motherboar)
sixthDoneMB: ^(Click the <color=yellow>CPU Button</color> and Select the CPU)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the CPU)
sixthDoneCPU: ^Next thing is, we need to cool off the CPU to process the data smoothly
^so we need to the <color=green>CPU FAN</color> to it
^(Click the <color=green>CPU FAN Button</color> and Select the CPU FAN that you want)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the CPU FAN)
sixthDoneCPUFan: ^Next we need to place the <color=lightblue>RAM</color> to this beast
^(Click the <color=lightblue>RAM Button</color> and Select the RAM that you have)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the RAM)
sixthDoneRAM: ^Next the Graphics Processing unit of your Computer or in short the <color=yellow>GPU</color>
^(Click the <color=yellow>GPU Button</color> and Select the GPU that you want)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the GPU)
sixthDoneGPU: ^Next the is the <color=green>Storage</color> of your computer
^it can be SSD or HDD but for now use the one that you have
^(Click the <color=green>Storage Button</color> and Select the Storage that you want)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the Storage)
sixthDoneStorage: ^the is the Power Supply Unit of your Computer or in short the <color=lightblue>PSU</color>
^(Click the <color=lightblue>PSU Button</color> and Select the PSU that you want)
^(Click the <color=green>Use Button</color> to Place the PSU)
sixthDonePSU: ^ now install the Operating System of your Computer
^(Click the <color=lightblue>Done Button</color> to Turn On and install the OS, and then click the Install Button and wait for it)
sixthDoneClick: ^, Now your PC Boots Up we just need to install the OS
^(Click the <color=aqua>Install Button</color> to install the OS and wait for it)
sixthDoneInstall: ^(You can Rename your PC and click the done)
sixthRenamed: ^Wow, Your PC is ready to go do you have any other desk or room to place your setup?, I have a spare Monitor, Mouse and Keyboard here.
^Yes I have an storage room but now is empty, its just the desk in there,
^it is a perfect place to setup this PC
^Ok, Lets go back to your room
Seventh: ^Now, Go to the room, all we need to do is to setup your PC
Eight: ^Its all Set, All you need to do is place your PC in the desk
^(Open the <color=green>Computers Button</color>, click the computer and, click the <color=green>use button</color>)
EightSecond: ^Nice! its all set, all we need to do is Turn On this Computer
Nine: ^Come downstairs, I have something for ya'll
^We need to go downstairs first Ian
NiceThird: ^My Mom needed me in the house
^ you just go there and turn it on
^Just meet me in my house if you have any questions
Ten: ^That's Delicious Mom, Thank You Very Much
^But I need to go upstairs the computer is ready to go
^You should Go My dear, and enjoy your new computer
Eleven: ^Wow, This is my first time to have a computer
^I just dreaming of an Computer earlier, and now I have one
^I wonder where the parts are came from, but nevermind at least I have one
^now, all I need to do is turn on this computer
ElevenSecond: ^Wow, The Computer is Booting Up, this is exciting
ElevenThird: ^Great, So this is the desktop I should Explore what are these Icons first
TwelveMYPC: ^Wow, so this is the Information of My Computer
^It Listed all the parts that my Computer Have
TwelveShop: ^So, This is the Website where can I buy new monitors, keyboard, mouse, desk, and decorations for my Setup
TwelveSettings: ^ok, Just the settings of the game
TwelveStats: ^I wonder, what the stats all about, but something about me
TwelveHardwares: ^I wonder what inside of this game, I should click the play button
TwelvePlayToMap: ^And the land was named after computer parts
^CPU Region is already unlocked I should check it.
Thirteen: ^There's a person here, I should talk to him...
ThirteenTwo: ^Yes? Why? And also I receive some mysterious computer parts earlier
^I even didn't ordered these stuff online
^Yes Of Course, I really want to have a computer that's why I assembled it ....
^After I build it, I open a mysterious game called The Hardwares and I been sucked up in the monitor
^I'm also stuck here and I want to go home, I've been teleported here after building that mysterious parts also...
^I'm also wishing to have a good computer that I can use, and some mysterious packages also came to my home...
^I build it, try it, open that icon and sucked up in the monitor...
^I don't know what to do here...
^How can I help you if I didn't also know what to do here?
^I explore the village and they say there is an old man here who knows about these village, they called it...
^Find that mysterious man, and talk again to me if you find him, I know he have an answer to our questions
^I'm afriad, I don't have any courage to find him, sorry
Fourteen: ^that question is just like "why you are here?"
^, our life have many different mysterious ways to achieve something
^And this is the one of that ways for you to achieve that something
^You are dreaming about a wonderful computer right?
^Yes? I want a computer, because it can help me for my studies
^You are here because we, want you to achieve that
^you see, this is a cpu world, cpu is the brain of the computer, without the cpu you can't run the computer
^So you are the one who sent those parts in my house???
^Yes, But I'm not the only one
^Did you see the map of the game your in?
^It have all the region for the needed parts of a computer
^Those regions have the abundancy of the materials to make that computer part
^For, example this region is CPU Region because we have plenty of silicons in here,
^silicons are the main ingredient to create a CPU
^But, theres another thing why we sent you here
^back then, we don't sent people in here
^The Exchangers of different regions only want to fullfill the dreams of all the people like you
^we Just give them thier dream parts to make them happy and to help them achieve thier dreams
^We just like Santa Claus, but in the world of Computer for the people who wish to have a computer
^But Our region has been bothered by some bad creatures, or people, or a bunch of bad enemies, who only wants our materials
^they steal the materials we used to create a computer part and those materials are vasnishing as they steal and steal it
^NO! I don't want and I can't, sorry
^I just want to go back home
^What if, I told you, as you fight those bad creatures and got thier stole materials you can exchange it to me to have another computer part...
^Also, this is the only way to get you back home
^Also, you will have the privilege to go back in here anytime you want so you can exchange materials for a part as you fight those bad creatures
^Just help us to retain what was ours
^The bad creatures are spawning in the wide area of our village where the materials are abundant
^Find that Area and kill those bad creatures
^Go back to me if you have any materials
^After that I will open the gate where you are being teleported and in there you can go back home...
^And the parts that you are exchanged will be delivered in to your home immediately as you exchange those to me
^Now go, and find that Area and fight those bad creature whose stealing our natural resources
Fifteen: ^I should go back first to this Lost Adventurer to tell him what I've known about this madness
FifteenTwo: ^You told me that you are also dreaming about a computer right?
^They sent you those computer parts to sent you here ....
^You are supposed to fight the creatures who bothered this village resources
^The Exchanger can't find you, that's why they sent another one, and that's me
^So how can we go out here
^I should fight those bad creatures to collect their stole materials
^I have some gold here, and I will give it to you
^I heard there is some sword dealer in this village
^Go find him and get ready to fight those creatures
^Ok, I will make us out of here
SixteenIntro: ^I should find this sword dealer in this village
Sixteen: ^Yes! I have plenty of Finest Swords in this Village
SixteenTwo: ^By the way, can I ask why you buy a sword?
^The Exchanger told me that there is some creatures bothering your village
^Ahh yes, this creatures are bad and they are merciless, they just want our silicons
^And this creatures are not only exist in our region, it is in other regions too, in Ram Region, CPU fan region, and all of the regions
^I don't know why they'd do these, maybe they want also a computer hahahaha
^Well, Good luck for those creatures Adventurer
SeventeenIntro: ^I should find this area and start a fight in bad creatures
Seventeen: ^So, this is the area that they are talking about...
^I should start fighting those creatures to get us home
EighteenIntro: ^Woo, That was intense but they are weak, I thought they are strong...
^I also got there money and materials...
^I should head back to the Exchanger now
Eighteen: ^and I have the materials you want
^, you are the savior of our region
^You can Exchange your materials for me, so you can upgrade your computer parts
^also, I will unlock the teleporter so you can get back home
^don't forget to go in here anytime you want
^I also hope that you can do that also in other region to retain thier materials in exchange of a computer parts
^Here are the materials I have, this will be renewed every 2 minutes
Nineteen: ^Your cpu will be delivered immediately into your home
^Now come with me into to the spawn, I will get you home
NineteenTwo: ^Umm, yes, I am the lost adventurer
^I'm waiting for you to come to me, but you didn't come
^Nevermind, I will get you two home
TwentyOne: ^That's the CPU I Exchange from the CPU Exchanger yesterday
TwentyTwo: ^Sheesh... This is the cpu I exchanged from the cpu exchanger
^I should go to my building desk and modify my computer
TwentyThree: ^I should place my computer here first
^Open the Hardwares by clicking the <color=lightblue>Hardwares button</color>
TwentyFourDoneComputers: ^Now Select the computer that you want to modify then click the <color=orange>Modify button</color>
TwentyFourDoneModify: ^Nice, Now I should replace my old cpu by the cpu I got from exchanger
^After that click the <color=green>Done Button</color> to successfully modify your computer
TwentyFive: ^Your Computer Parts have a perks for you to become stronger in the Hardwares World
^You can see that in the information of your computer
^You can also see the perks that you use while building your computer just click the <color=yellow>perks button</color> in the upper right corner
^That's nice I should probably go back to the Hardwares world and continue my adventures...
^but before that, I should meet the cpu exchanger again to get more info about the other regions
TwentySixIntro: ^I should meet again the cpu exchanger in the cpu region to get more info about the other regions
TwentySix: ^I want to know more about the other regions
^ahh ok, to unlock those regions, you need to become stronger too
^and as you fight the bad creatures and collect thier materials, you can also exchange that materials to the exchangers of the regions
^and they will give you the computer part that you want
^So, I need to become stronger and stronger to unlock those regions why?
^I fought the bad creatures here but they are weak do I need to be stronger?
^Yes, as you progress on unlocking those regions enemies are getting stronger and faster too
^the most stronger enemies are in the case region, they are elites and you need to fought them for us to fully functional again
^You need to buy powerful swords, armor, shield and helmet specially the computer parts that we exchange for you
^those computer parts are not just computer parts they make you also more stronger because of the perks it have
^ and don't hesitate to come with me if you want to exchange some materials for a cpu, sometimes I will have some legendary cpu at the table
TwentySevenRam: ^Now, I will work to Unlock the RAM Region
TwentySevenMB: ^Second to the last Region, The Motherboard Region
TwentySevenCase: ^Now The last Region, The Case Region
TwentySevenUnlocked: ^Nice, I unlocked all the regions I should go now to the Case Region and meet the Exchanger
TwentyEight: ^Nice, I unlocked all the Hardware Regions
^I should meet the Case Exchanger Now
TwentyEightTwo: ^I've been waiting for you to come for a long time
^Yes, The Journey is Tough but I handle it easily
^The Enemies are much stronger than previous enemies in other regions
^The they steal our resources and pested our village
^are you strong enough to fight them
^Well, Of course I am strong enough and I want to fight them
^I also want to upgrade my Case now so, don't worry I handle them
^Come back to me and Exhange the Materials that you collected Ok?
TwentyNineIntro: ^I should Go to the Case Enemy Area and Fight the Horde
ThirtyIntro: ^I should go back to the Case Exchanger and Exchange the Material that I collected for Case
Thirty: ^Ok, That's unexpected, but at least I finished it...
^I should go back to the Case Exchanger and Exchange the Material that I collected for Case
ThirtyTwo: ^Yes, I also got thier money and materials
^Here, Exchange those materials to a case
ThirtyThree: ^The case will be delivered to your house
^You can collect it and upgrade your computer aesthetics
^each region have 2nd villages and have a stronger enemies than before
^you can continue your journey and defeat those bastards
^but for the mean time, Thank you very much again
^you are our guardian angel here in the Hardwares world
^The cpu exchanger did not make a mistake in choosing you as the protector of our world
^I should head back home and collect those case
ThirtyFour: ^I should collect the case downstairs and modify my pc
ThirtyFive: ^Now, all I need to do is place this case to my current PC
^I should go to my building desk
ThirtySixIntroTwo: ^Nice, I successfully modified my PC, Now I should go to my desktop to see
ThirtySix: ^After all of that journey and adventure I finally build my dreamed PC for my own hardwork
^I finally made it, thanks to the exchanger and the enemies even though they not good to me
^I still owe them because I successfully build my own pc and not by just donation by the exchangers hehehe
^Now, I can repeat all the process to gain more parts and build more computer
^The Case Exchanger also said that, the journey is not yet done there is more village that pested by the enemies
^But for now, I just enjoy the success and feel my beloved PC
